Content.Text:
<RED>Spring Fashion Fiesta</RED>

Here's your chance to show off your personal
style! 

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>10:00</BLUE> and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>. A letter has been sent out in
advance detailing the event's theme. Prepare your
outfit in accordance with this theme and come
strut your stuff!

<RED>White Day</RED>

A special day to give <BLUE>sweets</BLUE> to a special girl to
show how much you appreciate her.

But what kinds of sweets? <BLUE>Soy Cookies</BLUE>?
<BLUE>Madeleines</BLUE>? <BLUE>Cream puffs</BLUE>? <BLUE>Pudding</BLUE>? <BLUE>Sponge
Cake</BLUE>? <BLUE>Crepes</BLUE>? The possibilities are endless...

<RED>Livestock Expo</RED>

It's Spring, and that means it's time for the <RED>Moo-
Moo Festival</RED>!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Get moooo-ving and enter the contest with your
favorite cow!

<RED>Tea Party</RED>

This is the time to meet and greet business
partners with all our heart...in the name of tea!

Register <GREEN>at the Guild counter</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE> and
<BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

We're only preparing enough drinks for those
who've registered, so sign up or NO TEA FOR YOU!

<RED>Harvest Festival</RED>

Do you have the highest-quality crops? Well,
now's your chance to prove it!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Entries are divided into the following categories:
<BLUE>Vegetables</BLUE>, <BLUE>Fruits</BLUE>, <BLUE>Flowers</BLUE> or <BLUE>Other</BLUE>.

<RED>Flower Fair</RED>

This is the day to give <BLUE>flowers</BLUE> or <BLUE>bouquets</BLUE> to
everyone in town, promoting happy thoughts and
good vibrations all throughout this silly little place
we call home.

<RED>Fishing Tournament</RED>

This is a contest to determine once and for all
who's worthy of the title "Supreme Angler"!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>7:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>10:00</BLUE> to compete against fellow anglers in a
race against the time limit. There's a big reward,
so put it all on the line!

<RED>Wild Safari</RED>

Come see the scintillating sights and hear the
harrowed howls of the town's safari park!

Register <GREEN>at the Guild counter</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE> and
<BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

More animals mean a better turnout, which means
more money, so...come one, come all!

<RED>Fireworks Show</RED>

This is a fireworks festival presented in honor of
the summer's great bounty.

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>20:00</BLUE>.

The show relies on donations, so the more you
chip in, the more awe-inspiring it'll be!

<RED>Livestock Expo</RED>

It's Summer, and that means it's time for the
<RED>Cluck-Cluck Festival</RED>!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Grab your favorite fowl and enter the contest...if
you're not chicken!

<RED>Harvest Festival</RED>

Do you have the highest-quality crops? Well,
now's your chance to prove it!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Entries are divided into the following categories:
<BLUE>Vegetables</BLUE>, <BLUE>Fruits</BLUE>, <BLUE>Flowers</BLUE> or <BLUE>Other</BLUE>.

<RED>Concert</RED>

Come out and enjoy a day of majestic musical
performances!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Who knows, they might play an old favorite of
yours...

<RED>Pet Promenade</RED>

A celebration of <L_BLUE>dogs</L_BLUE> and <L_BLUE>cats</L_BLUE>.

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Enter with your favorite pet for a day of fun!

<RED>Autumn Fashion Fiesta</RED>

Here's your chance to show off your personal
style!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>. A letter has been sent out in advance
detailing the event's theme. Prepare your outfit in
accordance with this theme and come strut your
stuff!

<RED>Livestock Expo</RED>

It's Autumn, and that means it's time for the
<RED>Hoppy Festival</RED>!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Hop to it and enter with your favorite bunny!

<RED>Cooking Exhibition</RED>

The oven mitts are coming off in this battle for
kitchen supremacy!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

You'll need to prepare a <BLUE>soup</BLUE>, <BLUE>salad</BLUE>, <BLUE>fried dish</BLUE>, <BLUE>pot
dish</BLUE>, <BLUE>rice dish</BLUE>, <BLUE>noodles/bread</BLUE>, <BLUE>snack</BLUE>, or <BLUE>beverage</BLUE>.

<RED>Harvest Festival</RED>

Do you have the highest-quality crops? Well,
now's your chance to prove it!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Entries are divided into the following categories:
<BLUE>Vegetables</BLUE>, <BLUE>Fruits</BLUE>, <BLUE>Flowers</BLUE> or <BLUE>Other</BLUE>.

<RED>Valentine's Day</RED>

A special day to give <BLUE>sweets</BLUE> to a special guy to
show how much you appreciate him.

Choose from <BLUE>chocolate truffles</BLUE>, <BLUE>chocolate fondue</BLUE>,
<BLUE>chocolate cake</BLUE>, <BLUE>chocolate cookies</BLUE>, <BLUE>chocolate
pudding</BLUE>, and <BLUE>chocolate ice cream</BLUE>.

<RED>Livestock Expo</RED>

It's Winter, and that means it's time for the <RED>Wooly
Festival</RED>!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Don't be sheep-ish! Ewe should sign up today!

<RED>Starlight Gala</RED>

Are you read to enjoy an enchanting evening of
stargazing with the one you love?

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>20:00</BLUE>.

<RED>Harvest Festival</RED>

Do you have the highest-quality crops? Well,
now's your chance to prove it!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>13:00</BLUE>.

Entries are divided into the following categories:
<BLUE>Vegetables</BLUE>, <BLUE>Fruits</BLUE>, <BLUE>Flowers</BLUE> or <BLUE>Other</BLUE>.

<RED>New Year's Festival</RED>

Ring in the new year with your friends and
neighbors! Come, socialize, and enjoy all the
homemade noodles you can eat, courtesy of
Sakura Country!

Register <GREEN>in front of the Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00</BLUE>
and <BLUE>20:00</BLUE>.

<RED>Anniversary</RED>

Celebrate the date of your marriage with family
and friends!
